website_summaries.verdict: This 600 pound capacity Olympic bar with aggressive knurling.
pros: An Olympic bar with center knurl marks
A great bar that spins freely and feels great
cons: This bar is prone to rusting

customer_reviews.title: Not an intermediate bar as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the bar for 3 weeks. This bar bent after deadlifting 315 5x10, and pause squatting high bar 225x5, 245x5, 265x5, and 295x5. It bent while i was in the hole during pause squats. This is a good bar for people who are new to lifting, but i dont think this is an intermediate bar as advertised. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bar will not last
customer_reviews.text: Cheap barbells like this with the bolt-on collars always fail before long. The bolt on the one I received had backed out just from shipping. I tightened it and, after a few times of just spinning the collar, it was already loose again. Inevitably the bolt will start to shear with use and it will never get tight again. I went through 4 of these types of bars when I started lifting because mine had a warranty. Should have learned my lesson then. I bought a Texas Power Bar- a few hundred dollars more but I'll never need another.
customer_reviews.author: Kody E

customer_reviews.title: Solid bar to begin with
customer_reviews.text: I can't honestly find a lot to complain about with this bar. It weighs exactly 45 pounds, the ends spin freely and it arrived in pretty good shape. The knurling is a bit rough, I could see it chewing your hands up if you're not used to it. The packaging left a little to be desired, though I can't say I have a better idea of how to ship one of these things. Arrived with a few minor dings and had some small areas that were left unpainted. Just cosmetic stuff though. I can see this bar easily lasting me 5+ years assuming I still have skin on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bar enough to buy two of them. For the price, it's what I'd recommend. It's not perfect, but it ticks all the right boxes. I do have some complaints, the first, of course, being that it's underweight for a standard Olympic Bar. It's 44lbs, not 45lbs. I know that hardly matters, but it matters to me. Also, when I received my second bar, the bar was dirty. I don't know how or why, but the bar had mud on it, even though it was packaged properly and the plastic wrap had not been breached. Overall, I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leet

customer_reviews.title: Wider than usual
customer_reviews.text: This is the bar at the gym that everyone trades out when it’s time to deadlift. The knurling is not great (hardly any grip) and is too wide!!! I love deadlifting without straps to increase my forearm strength but this bar is terrible. Too wide, no grip. I suppose it would be ideal for those who want to grow larger forearms, and it’s okay for every other lift. But if you deadlift, find a different bar.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a wonky bar that was going bad. Much better construction on this one. Nothing has needed tightened and it feels incredibly sturdy. The grips are placed in just the right spots.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Poorly shipped.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the bar. Extremely disappointed how it was shipped. The photo taken is exactly how it arrived at my door. I notified Amazon. I’d recommend this product to someone else - only after someone eventually lets me know - that the shipping I experienced was a 1-time error. Hope this helps others.
customer_reviews.author: T. Savel

customer_reviews.title: Good bar for price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using body solid bars for around 5-6 yrs now. This bar is very good for the price. I would like to see a better Olympic bar in this price range. My bar weighs exactly 45lbs. It's not a Rogue but those are hundreds of dollars, that's not a fair comparison. Far a home gym this bar should serve just fine. Ignore the negative reviews. I've been lifting weights on/off my whole life. This bar is more than adequate for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: RUST AFTER 2 WEEKS?
customer_reviews.text: This bar arrived covered in oil and with lots of nicks and scratch marks revealing the silver metal underneath... I wasn't incredibly discouraged by this as I'm more concerned with its function than cosmetic appearance. HOWEVER, I have kept this bar indoors at all times and after only 2 weeks it was covered in a brown powder that I was convinced couldn't possibly be rust... IT IS!!!!!! The whole bar is RUSTING STRAIGHT THROUGH THE PAINT!!! Incredibly disappointed. Rust gets all over hands and shirt when you lift. Very disappointed.... It must have been stored improperly prior to shipping. Will have to buy a different bar....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bar for $100
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bar, especially with free shipping. Have stacked 200lbs with no issues. Nothing is loose or scratched after a few weeks of heavy use mainly on concrete. Only issue was that it was shipped with some sort of dirt or oil on it. I assume either it was to protect the metal? Either way it came off with a rag and water. Great bar, great price and great workout!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget bar!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bar way back in December 2017 (my apologiesfor the late review). I have used it periodically until last year when I started working out solidly 4-5 times a week. It has great gnurling and has taken everything I've thrown at it. This bar still looks/ feels just as good as day 1. The only marks on it are on the sleeves from sliding weight on and off. I have cleaned it routinely and oiled the sleeves just one time since purchase! I use it for squat/ benchpress now but it used to be my all-around bar with deadlifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Goonie

customer_reviews.title: I got exactly what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a starting barbell to handle around 500 lbs, which is exactly what I got. The bar had to be cleaned of storage oil first and the finish is consistent. The knurling is not very aggressive at all and is pretty shallow, but that does not affect my ability to use the bar. The collars are held on with socket cap bolts like all cheap barbells are, so keep a hex key nearby to keep them tight and you'll be set. Overall the bar was worth the money for a starter garage bar to go with my starter cast plates. This is a great buy if you are looking to start a home gym on a budget
customer_reviews.author: mustypines

customer_reviews.title: Hex nut comes loose.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new bar. I dont lift heavy but still like to do floor lifts like deadlifts and powercleans. The bar is adequate for what i use it for, it has a black matte finish and the collars rotate ok. The 1 thing I dont like is that the second time I used it I had to tighten the hex nut to prevent it from falling out. If your a heavy lifter it would be better to spend the extra $ for better bar. But for what I am doing and the price I paid (a little over one hundred) it will do.
customer_reviews.author: kenpo saber

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar , great price
customer_reviews.text: this Bar looks amazing and I defiantly recommend this to others . My only suggestion would be to put more Styrofoam on both ends , with the shipping it does take a beating and you end up with a couple of small nicks and dents but nothing major to be complain about . Overall a great bar and even a better price ... PS: all the 1 starts shows the black bar so I recommend buying the Chrome bar ....
customer_reviews.author: jobob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bar for our home gym
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bar for our home gym. The bar feels a tiny bit thicker than it should be, but we are able to adapt and helps with grip strength. The ends are super slippery when you start using it so you definitely need clamps (half the time at the gym we wouldn't use any, but slight tilts will send weights sliding with this bar). But it's very durable, and contrasting to other reviews I feel the knurling is smoother than the bars I use at the gym (which usually scrape my chest a bit on cleans, while this bar doesn't). The ends rotate very smoothly for easy lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Elinneb

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product. After going through 3 less expensive bars ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. After going through 3 less expensive bars (they all bent in the center), I purchased this Power Bar. It works perfectly without any bending or warping. After owning this bar for about a yea nowr, with many workouts, this bar is still straight and in excellent shape. It was expensive but worth it. I would rather pay double for something that works and lasts than pay for cheaper products that have to be replaced every 3 or 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: RON VARSHAY

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great bar. I read some scary reviews but I have to say so far so good. Does come with some sort of oil and it does have the propensity to rust...and I'm in Arizona. So in more humid places the rusting could be worse...I've only noticed very slight rust on the collars where the weight scratched the paint off. I figure over time the rust will wear away. I use it with my landmine.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: One thing I don’t like about this bar is that it isn’t flush on the ends, it’s curved. So when you put plates on it they don’t sit flush against the bar, pretty bad design to be honest. When i try to deadlift with this bar the plates start going all over the place because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid black bar.
customer_reviews.text: This bar is the real deal, especially for a home gym. A little locktite red to the collar bolt treads would cure people's concern that they back out. Looks clean and well built, perfect balance and very inexpensive. It's not a commercial bar but 1 or 2 people could use this bar for years and not worry.
customer_reviews.author: PublicName

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Good solid barbell. I don’t lift much more than I00lbs at the moment, so this bar meets my needs. Only downside for me was the textured grip could have come in a little closer to the middle for me, which is what I am used to at my local gym. I am quite a petite woman and it feels a little unnatural for me to put my arms so far apart for some moves. Other than that, great bar once you have finally got it out of the packaging and degreased it.
customer_reviews.author: GalVeg

customer_reviews.title: Very poor packaging. The bar was hanging out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor packaging. The bar was hanging out of the end, and was scratched up pretty bad. It seems to still function and doesn't seem to bent. The only factor that keeps me from going insane is that it's only a $100 bar. Had some rust on the bar from the oil that was on the bar. It came very greasy... turned my hands orange hopefully I can get it off. I haven't dropped the bar yet so that will be a future review. Not impressed so far, but it functions well I may update the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great bar, the knurls are perfectly spaced for deadlifts
customer_reviews.text: Great bar, the knurls are perfectly spaced for deadlifts. The grain it a little sharp but I like it, (so does the ole lady) gives you that nice man hands feel. Weight is almost exact, 45.2 I believe it was when I weighed it. I don't do cleans and snatches so I don't drop it far, can't comment on that. There's nothing I don't like about this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Dante R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It appears to be an Olympic bar. My plates fit, and the grip is comfortable. The price was great.
customer_reviews.author: KfillyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: This barbell is the best barbell you’re going to find for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have had few issues with this barbell. Originally I think I paid $107 for it and it has lasted me since October 2018 and still kicking. Great for regular Olympic lifts and any HIIT or CrossFit exercises as well. I live in Hawaii so obviously rust was a major concern of mine when I first bought it. It very rarely has rust accumulate and if it does it’s surface rust that I can easily wipe away. So if you don’t live in a humid environment it should do fine. Great starter bar for an excellent price. Just don’t treat this bar like crap and it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Watts

customer_reviews.title: Good bar, but arrived very greasy, and grips aren't symmetrical
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big fan of ruining shirts while unboxing exercise equipment. It's difficult to figure out where to place your hands because the grips are not symmetrical. Despite this, after cleaning it up with a rag, it seems to be a sturdy bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: What’s to really say? It’s a body solid product and you get what you pay for. Bar came perfectly wrapped and in great condition. So far so good. Holds up to me tossing around weights.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! There are much better bars for only a few dollars more. I bought a CAP Bar for $129 at the same time and should have just bought two of those instead of this one. This arrived late, and was covered in rust when I received it. The black coating is garbage. Overall cheaply made bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Second bar from Body Solid. Just as happy as the first time!
customer_reviews.text: Their design and attention to detail and great steel speaks for itself. The black is semi gloss, not reflective. I'm happy I paid extra for the black one. The black coating feels better to my hands and doesn't slip or mess with my clothes or shoes. Body Solid is always great quality!
customer_reviews.author: A B Stone

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, it's a true Olympic bar weighing 45lbs and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got my bar today, I'm beginning to weightlift at home. My husband has been lifting for years, and approves! It did have oil on it but it came off with a rag and gentle cleaner. Feels good, it's a true Olympic bar weighing 45lbs and 7' long. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joy W.

customer_reviews.title: True product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying strength lifting equipment. After shoping around online and at sport stores i decided to go with this product and im 100% satisfied. Very sturdy and very well bulit. My 2 45lbs and 2 25lbs plates went on smooth and i have 0 issues. Thanx guys
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Great barbell!  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in good condition. This is a very nice barbell, really happy with it. Couldn't be happier with the price I paid for the quality of it. If you're looking for an inexpensive barbell and don't want to break the bank with a $130-200 barbell, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great barbell, quality packaging!
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard Oly barbell and I love the black finish! It feels well put together and I was highly impressed with how it was packaged. I'm just starting to get into Olympic lifting and this barbell feels identical to the ones at my Oly gym. Zero complaints and zero regrets purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lee Green

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Olympic Bar
customer_reviews.text: Has worked perfectly for all exercises I've used it for (cross fit workouts, typical lifting, etc). The only thing I didn't like about the bar is that it came drenched in some awful smelling oil. The entire bar. I'm sure it's all part of the manufacturing process and bearing lubrication, but it would be nice if it was at least wiped down a bit before being shipped. Not a big deal at all, just a heads up for anyone buying. Be sure to wear gloves and clothes you don't mind getting dirty while removing from packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, construction poor
customer_reviews.text: I use this barbell for Olympic weightlifting and would recommend you don't use it for this purpose. Almost no knurling on the bar so it's impossible to grip without a ton of chalk - the level of grip on the bar looked like what you would get after using for years. If I didn't know better, I'd say the bar was delivered used. The bar can be dropped, but the sleeve is so laughably loose that it sounds like you're breaking it, clanging like bells every time you drop it even from a deadlift position. Use it for squats or overhead presses.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Keen

customer_reviews.title: Cool bar!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and love it so far! Was really greasy when we took it out of the package my hands turned brown....as it supposed to be like that? Also as others have said the box was mangled when it arrived and super dirty not sure why. Only one end of the barbell had slight scratches on the very end but overall I love it
customer_reviews.author: V. Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Bad Grip, but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The knurling on this bar is HORRIBLE. I have so much trouble gripping it that I have to plan certain lifts around going to the gym instead of using this one at my house which defeats the whole purpose of having a home gym. I have to chalk up for BENCH PRESS. That is crazy if you ask me, I've literally never had a problem with any other bar in my life. Despite this it is sturdy and a good value for only 100 dollars. I'd trust given weight rating for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Rusty before even opening
customer_reviews.text: I think it deserves about a 2.5. It arrived very rusty and even the plastic wrapping around it turned brown in many areas. It was a pain to clean off especially with all the rust. I think ill have to use a rust cleaner to clear all of the rust unless I want rust all over my hands every workout. It is a bar and does what it needs to do in the end but could have been packaged better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P.

customer_reviews.title: I looked into this order and realized the bar I received is not at all like the one in the description
customer_reviews.text: As I was looking at my orders from the past, I looked into this order and realized the bar I received is not at all like the one in the description. It isn’t chrome at all. It’s some type of black iron. The middle piecce it’s also uneven with the rest of the bat which can hurt the hands. Wish I noticed this before.
customer_reviews.author: Antonella

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value.
customer_reviews.text: Great barbell. Friggin felt heavier than 44lbs but whatever. Lol. I love it. I gor the black one and its the shiz. I use it a lot outside and sweat ALOT so i make sure to clean it often so it doesnt rust. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bar
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar. Feel like a viking warlord carrying a 7' bronze war tool. Arghhh!!!! Came in the cold covered in machine oil that was gooey due to temperature. A little bit of a pain to clean it thoroughly. Still oily after cleaning and several workouts. Other than that, it's awesome. Holds weight great and let's it roll smoothly. Totally stress free. Haven't put more than 110lbs on it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: Packaging wasn't great.. It had scratches out of he box. To large and heavy to deal with the hassle of returning so I unpackaged. Be careful where you open this package and what clothes your wearing because the bar was VERY oily out of the box. You'll need paper towels or a rag to wipe it down. Nonetheless, I'm sure it will serve its purpose. I'll update once I've started using it.
customer_reviews.author: NY2MD

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I didn't have a try to heavy things. but should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Jack L

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy, Perfect for anyone looking to lift weights. The bar alone is heavy and to add weights to it is no joke. I purchased this at home and its similar to the one on a smith machine. If you are a beginner I advise you to have some one spot you on this, especially if your using it for a home gym like myself.
customer_reviews.author: rntbrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Definetly worth it if you need a solid olympic bar for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome barbell. Exactly 44.4 lbs on the dot i weighed it. Great buy for its price. Can hold several hundred pounds these would be good for just about anyone in the gym for any lift. Obviously if you are lifting an excess amount of weight the bar will bend but for me I never need to put on more then 350 pounds and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for the price. Would be adequate for any lifts done in a home gym. While there is center knurling which is great, the knurling is pretty abrasive and needs to be sanded down a bit for more comfort. Other than that one issue this bar is a workhorse and id trust it with any amount of weight below double digit 45# plates. Delivery was quick as well, arrived in 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: This came in the box broken. I am not sure what function this serves but it makes me question the quality, also this bar was covered in grease. Which is okay
customer_reviews.author: Nick Overfelt

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: Great bar. It's worked really well for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bar for Olympic lifts for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 3/5 for presentation as loading the bar will eventually cause noticeable scratch marks and sweat will deteriorate the black paint where you grip the bar. It’s a sturdy bar that does everything I want it to. It looks and feels sturdy in the hands and holds 3 plates on each side without bar flexion. If I were to buy again I would select the chrome bar instead of the matte black one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and good looking bar
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bar. Got the black one and it is beautiful. I don't think that scratches will be a problem. I'm glad I got the black one. I have heard that chrome bars often chip or peel. This doesn't appear to be an issue with this bar. The knurling is not too deep for me. Yes the bar was greasy on arrival. Not a problem. Easily wiped down with rag. I have been looking for a good and affordable bar for a while. This has exceeded my expectations. It looks and feels much more solid then many bars I have tried. I could not be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and quality, you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't to sure about getting this bar because of some reviews on here... BUT, I'm happy I did. For the price and quality, you really can't go wrong. Now with that being said, the only issue I did have was the way the packaging looked when I got it. Or should I say, what was left of it. I would not point blame at Body-Solid whatsoever, I'm just saying don't expect that cardboard tube to make it across state lines unblemished. Thankfully there was no damage to the bar and works seamlessly. I would definitely get this bar again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Quality sturdy bar worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. This is a solid, well-built, sturdy olympic bar. It was packaged appropriately, arrived a day early, and coated with a thin layer of petroleum jelly for rust protection (wiped right off with a soapy dish cloth.) It is textured and grips just right. Fits olympic 2" olympic plates perfectly. No complaints about this bar. 5 stars. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: and OHP are fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok bar. I've had 300lbs on the bar and its holding up well. The oil was not a huge issue for me as others have stated. The only thing I don't care for is the grip when doing deadlifts, so I basically never use it for deadlifts unless for whatever reason I cant make it to the gym. Squat, bench, and OHP are fine.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: My favorite barbell
customer_reviews.text: This bar is perfect. The thickness and the knirlings are just right. I personally will never lift over 600 pounds so I don’t need to spend $250 for a bar that can deal with a heavier load. This is by far my favorite bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Barbell that matches the ones in the Gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought this barbell because I wanted a barbell that matched the feel and quality of a gym barbell. Mission accomplished!! The weight and feel of this matches the same ones from the gym, except that it's new. It arrived greased up and required a good wipe down with a cloth soaked with alcohol, but once that is finished...nice, very nice. The hand grips have a lot of bite, so gloves should be used, but otherwise, this is an excellent bar. I would buy again and again. The price is right and it can hold up to 600 lbs. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it comes covered an an oil that is annoying to try to get off
customer_reviews.text: Shaped as expected and seems study. However, it comes covered an an oil that is annoying to try to get off. Not sure if they just over-oiled this thing after refurbishing it, but it is certainly well-oiled, and that is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid well built bar havent had any issues with it, ill update if any pop up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid bar. Both screws keep coming loose no matter how much I tighten them
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bar for the price and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar for the price and gets the job done. The bar does come coated in oil to prevent rusting, but with some chalk and an old cloth, this will not be a problem. Knurling is great for grip and not excessively aggressive.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great bar, for a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: very well built bar, I got the one on in black, and it is exactly what it is described as. A nice solid well built Olympic 7ft bar. Feels very solid in my hands, the grip areas are a bit rough but it is a brand new bar so it might wear in as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Lydon

customer_reviews.title: But otherwise - it's a great bar and I've used it on a daily since ...
customer_reviews.text: this is your standard olympic bar - it comes in a weird tube packaging as one solid piece, so be prepared for that. But otherwise - it's a great bar and I've used it on a daily since receiving it. update - i still use this on the daily. and it's a fantastic purchase. would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to build their own gym or get a little workout in at home.
customer_reviews.author: LSo

customer_reviews.title: Decent barbell- terrible shipping
customer_reviews.text: The barbell itself seems great and functional, which is foremost and why it's two stars rather than one. I was not a fan, however, of it's arrival in a single, poorly covered sheet of plastic that led to it being scuffed in shipment. I understand that there's a modicum more of cost associated with packaging in a box but the end result is shipment without damages and that seems the much better course. The associated pain to package correctly and return an unwieldy item doesn't warrant the bother. Wish I had bought a barbell elsewhere, tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Standard Olympic bar
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Good quality, no extra bend. Grip is nothing special but it's your run of the mill Olympic bar. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Barbell
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day in our PT Studio. Hold all the weight we need for our clients.
customer_reviews.author: Personal Training Heros

customer_reviews.title: Messy but then again i like it that way
customer_reviews.text: Good solid bar for 96 bucks and quick shipping. I wiped mine down with soapy water and a rag to dry it in order to get some of the petroleum oil off. There was a thick layer, like the plastic bag it was in has left over oil in it dripping out. Lol. Messy to open but still, can't beat a solid hunk of metal for some squizzzots!
customer_reviews.author: jo francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great product good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product good price, packaged arrived a little banged up with scuff on one side (shipped in hard cylinder cardboard tube) not ment to look pretty anyways so very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Leo74

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Have this in my home gym. Great bar without breaking the bank. Had this for several months and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: BBQisgreat

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a sturdy bar
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy bar. Want to rate higher but knurling is very sharp and inconsistent. Actually cut my hand on a jagged point. Taped center knurling as it was digging into back. Been on rough bars. Normally I just tough it out but If its breaking skin on bench/squat it's a problem. So may have to tape / grind knurling. Would not recommend for Oly lifts until you do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I had another Olympic bar but compared to this one this one out shines better grip plates don’t slide definitely a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Solid body from body solid
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a solid piece of steel bar. It has nice sleeves and grips well.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was fine for me
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was fine for me. There wasn’t really much grease on it like others mention. I didn’t even have to clean it. I live in Sacramento ca and my order was during January so plenty of moisture in the air although the day it was delivered it didn’t rain. But my point there is that it had no rust as others have experienced. Overall seems like a great bar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not so good shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great. But arrived in packaging that was falling apart, had very bad dings and scratches on the ends, some of which I had to file away at since the plates kept catching on them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bar
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully built, and the grips are not too rough/cross hatched. Be careful to wipe it down when you first get it as it has a coat of oil on it for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: this is what it says it is but it does rust rather quickly
customer_reviews.text: it is what it is and does what it needs too but rust out rather quickly
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say, but very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great bar. Ribbed ends are nice if ur using clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent bar. Packaging was ok
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bar. Packaging was ok, it was thickly packed, but the top and bottom are separate pieces of cardboard so i can see where it might bend. The bar is nicely weighted. The knurling is nice. All the bumper plates fit well. The diameter is not out of the ordinary. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT! I'm an advanced lifter and this bar is more than adequate for 500lb plus lifts.. dont let the fair price fool you. EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power Lifting
customer_reviews.text: Great bar. Just like what I use at the gym. Bought it for a great price and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: michael harris-smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made and weight of the bar was spot on. Make sure you clean the bar good before using!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Buddles

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: The bar came in great shape no dents or scratches. The only complaint would be the amount of oil on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Biozepp

customer_reviews.title: 7 ft Bar the Way to Go
customer_reviews.text: Gym quality, can withstand more than you can lift--admit it, and it looks cool. Black is sexy, there is no disputing it. This bar has performed great in the gym I built in the garage and so far nothing but nice things to say about it. 7ft was the best way to go since it is used for squats, lifting, and cleans. Slammed it more than once and its still going strong--no bends or breaks that I can see.
customer_reviews.author: RealBuyer

customer_reviews.title: good first bar.
customer_reviews.text: great first bar. weights fit on nice and with a good clip no wobbling. the kneerling is not very deep but using chalk helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, and he regularly deadlifts heavy weight, over 450. The bar hasn't bent or budged in any way, shape or form. Not too rough on the hand grips, they don't bother him at all. Holds heavy weight as described. Would recommend to any lifter.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley

customer_reviews.title: so getting plates on and off is easy and the plates don’t get scratched
customer_reviews.text: The bar arrived very quickly – within a few days of ordering - faster then estimated delivery. The most important part for me was that there was no grooved pattern on the sleeves. The sleeves (the area where you load the plates) are smooth, so getting plates on and off is easy and the plates don’t get scratched. Although there was no visible machine oil on the bar I could smell it. I wiped the bar with paper towels just in case. I use it with barbell lock (quick snatch) collars and it works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Bar is great, fits well on my banch and does ineed ...
customer_reviews.text: Bar is great, fits well on my banch and does ineed weight 45~ lbs so my wife can even use it with nothing on additionaly. I used it with 50 lbs on each side so far and there were no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rony L

customer_reviews.title: These seem pretty solid and the build looks great
customer_reviews.text: These seem pretty solid and the build looks great. However, these were covered in oil/lubricating gunk... I don't think it'd be that hard to have one of your factory techs wipe these down before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great bar. Well made. I love the grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great. The box it came in
customer_reviews.text: The bar? Great. The box it came in, with layers upon layer of tape on the bar itself, was a nightmare to unpackage. Had tape glue all over my bar, spent a half hour scrubbing it off.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: knurl is medium depth on the black 7ft bar
customer_reviews.text: The knurl is comfortable for me and I have soft hands. If the knurl is too rough for you, you can wrap it in cheap athletic tape. The oil helps prevent rusting so don't remove all the oil. Buy a chrome bar if you don't like rust and live in a humid area.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: SOLID BAR!
customer_reviews.text: Bar is sold! I disagree with seeing some posts previously about the weights not rolling with it. I lay it on the ground and the ends of my bar move as freely as the bars in the gym. I know this bar will be able to handle anything i put it through unlike the bar i purchased from walmart which came in 3 piece sections and felt like it was bending at the ends with only 150lbs on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good idea to wipe the bar down with a towel ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Good idea to wipe the bar down with a towel upon unpacking, to remove the grease. Bar is very sturdy. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great bar and a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great bar and a good price. Knurling is great, I already have fairly calloused hands, but I didn’t find it especially sharp as some reviews state. Bar weighed in 44 and some chnage, so spot on for me. It’s a perfect starter bar for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: Barbell is delivered on time and in amazing condition upon arrival. Its a great weight for beginners to advanced and also a great addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home gym
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for the home gym, just a tad thicker than the one at the club but I actually like it better. It's 5* from me since it is exactly what I wanted and I cannot see any reason to knock a point off.
customer_reviews.author: Frank North

customer_reviews.title: it was the right price
customer_reviews.text: It get's the job done. It came covered in some oil that makes a huge mess. I still get residue all over my hands and the back finish rubs off. But I was looking to save money, so I can't complain too much. I use it for the "slow" lifts (back squat, bench press, deadlift) so no comment on how it would hold up for olympic lifting or crossfit.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Bar
customer_reviews.text: Just got the bar earlier this week, but great so far. Good quality and price
customer_reviews.author: christian

customer_reviews.title: its a good bar for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you're realistic about the price you're paying for this bar, its a good bar for the money. Received in black with a light coat of machine oil... which while some people dislike, it's necessary to prevent rust. Unfortunately, that's also the reason for -1 star, despite being brand new and coated in oil, there were a couple small rust spots. Given I know I won't be meticulous about regularly maintaining it with oil myself, I know I'll develop small rust marks here and there. Not ideal, but overall satisfied for the price tag given higher quality bars are 2-3x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT. I recommend this for any situation. Love it for my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lenhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great Olympic barbell
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and comes greased. No shipping problems nor damages.
customer_reviews.author: Athens NAW

customer_reviews.title: purchased May 17, 2015 and still holding up great
customer_reviews.text: works great! perfect size, real heavy duty, still in great shape after a year! no missing paint. edit: used 4-6 times a week sometimes more by other people that use my home gym. the paint is still in great shape no rust no issues
customer_reviews.author: ryan sauer

customer_reviews.title: Wash bar immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Have only put about 350 on this bar but it moved it like it was nothing so seems strong. Black crap that was on the bar was irritatingly difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: JV

product_meta.title: Body-Solid Tools Olympic Straight Bar (OB86), 7 Feet, Chrome
product_meta.description:
A favorite of bodybuilders everywhere and a staple of championship lifts, the Body-Solid Tools Olympic Straight Bar is designed to help take your free weight workouts to the next level. Precision-engineered from the highest-quality components, this Olympic weight bar can support up to 600 pounds of plates, letting you take on incredibly heavy workloads.

The Body-Solid Olympic Straight Bar weighs 44 pounds and has knurled grips along the length of the bar for a secure hold. It measures 86 inches long with an 15.5-inch collar length and a 51-inch inside sleeve. Use this straight barbell with Body-Solid Olympic Weight Plates (OPB) and Olympic Spring Collars (OC06).

Triple-plated chrome finish protects against rusting, chipping, scarring and peeling
feature_bullets: OLYMPIC BARBELL: Our Olympic bar weighs 44 pounds and has a 600 weight plate capacity on a loadable sleeve length of 11. 25-inches
WEIGHT TRAINING: Our 7-foot Olympic bar is perfect for various forms of power lifting, weight lifting, bench press and cross training exercises
PRODUCT SPECS: Olympic bar has a shoulder bolt collar bolt and is built with a 30mm bar diameter
DURABILITY: Our 7-foot Olympic bar is precision engineered of the highest quality components. Triple plated chrome finish protects against rusting, chipping, scarring and peeling
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Overall bar length is 86" with a 51. 5" shaft length and 2” end bar dimension
